item.title: Why FFT matters to undergraduates?
item.description: Above: Live graphics created for a music set at Pimp the Chateau, France, December 2009. Click anywhere on the page to pause / play. Music Maison Kitsune. Introduction In my third year of grad school, I decided to gather up all the good people I had met so far. A close group of friends and I brainstormed ideas about what would make an event special.
